mapper.select: select catecode, catename from spring_product_category order by catecodeseq asc
select speccode, specname from spring_product_spec order by specseq asc
mapper.insert: insert into spring_product(prodseq, prodname, fk_catecode, prodcompany, prodqty, price, saleprice, fk_speccode, prodcontent, prodpoint) values(#{PRODSEQ}, #{PRODNAME}, #{FK_CATECODE}, #{PRODCOMPANY}, default, #{PRICE}, #{SALEPRICE}, #{FK_SPECCODE}, #{PRODCONTENT}, #{PRODPOINT})

insert into spring_productimage(prodimageseq, fk_prodseq, imagefilename, imageorgFilename, imagefileSize, thumbnailFileName) values(seq_spring_productimage.nextval, #{FK_PRODSEQ}, #{IMAGEFILENAME}, #{IMAGEORGFILENAME}, #{IMAGEFILESIZE}, #{THUMBNAILFILENAME})
insert into spring_productibgo(productibgoseq, prodseq, ibgoqty, prodinputdate) values(seq_spring_productibgo.nextval, #{PRODSEQ}, #{IBGOQTY}, default)
mapper.update: update spring_product set prodqty = prodqty + #{IBGOQTY} where prodseq = #{PRODSEQ}
mapper.select: select A.prodseq, A.catename, A.prodname, A.prodcompany, A.specname, B.thumbnailfilename from view_spring_productinfo A left join (select * from spring_productimage where prodimageseq in (select min(prodimageseq) from spring_productimage group by fk_prodseq)) B on A.prodseq = B.fk_prodseq
select imagefilename, imageorgfilename, imagefilesize, thumbnailfilename from spring_productimage where fk_prodseq = #{fk_prodseq} order by prodimageseq asc

select R.reservationSeq, M.userid, M.name, M.email, to_char(R.reservationDate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mm') as reservationDate, R.mailSendCheck from jsp_member M join scheduletest_reservation R on M.userid = R.fk_userid where to_char(reservationDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate+1, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and R.mailSendCheck = 0
